meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Judy Flannery Doug Petroff-Tobler Steve Kravitz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #790.

div.div: Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Judy Flannery, a homemaker from Eugene, Oregon
Doug Petroff-Tobler, a civil litigator from Phoenix, Arizona
Steve Kravitz, a trust and estate attorney from West Palm Beach, Florida (whose 3-day cash winnings total $35,400)

tr.td: AUTOBIOGRAPHIES
COLORS
GEOLOGY
CLASSIC COUNTRY
STARTS WITH "B"
ENDS WITH "UNK"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
